title: Top 5 British Virgin Islands Luxury Resorts To Stay
text:
Home > Hotels & Resorts > Top 5 British Virgin Islands Luxury Resorts To Stay Top 5 British Virgin Islands Luxury Resorts To Stay By admin on August 29, 2015 Pin It 
The British Virgin Islands is spread across 1000 square miles encompassing over 50 islands. It serves as a home to innumerable villas, hotels, anchorages and resorts. The ultimate method of traversing the entire territory is a boat that can take you from one island to another. 
The place is packed with some of the most exotic and most affordable luxury resorts and hotels that can offer you splendid views of the islands. Top British Virgin Islands Luxury Resorts 
Some of the most popular British Virgin Islands luxury resorts, where you can enjoy stay during your visit include: Peter Island Resort 
The Peter Island Resort is also called one of the “Best Places to Stay in the World” featuring all romance and exclusivity. This private island resort offers 52 rooms and boasts of 1200 acres of luscious mountainous terrain including five private beaches. 
The resort can be accessed only by a helicopter or a boat and is surrounded by sparkling waters of the Caribbean, the Atlantic and Sir Francis Drake Channel. 
For booking and other information: Peter Island Resort Scrub Island Resort And Marina 
This is one of the youngest private island resorts in the British Virgin Islands offering top quality oceanview suites. A vacation at this resort is modern day discovery and an adventure in luxurious living. 
For booking and other information: Scrub Island Resort And Marina Nanny Cay Resort Marina 
This is one of the best British Virgin Islands luxury resorts positioned at Roadtown providing ample services and activities for yachtsmen and vacationers. The resort features 42 air-conditioned rooms with private balconies and patios which are fully equipped with creature comforts and even a kitchen. 
For booking and other information: Nanny Cay Resort Marina Rosewood Little Dix Bay 
This is a resort that will give you the scope of having the ocean at your door. This resort is set on the beach and is located right beside the ocean. The amenities include 100 rooms featuring thoughtful touches such as slippers and bathrobes including balconies and Wi-Fi. 
For booking and other information: Rosewood Little Dix Bay Biras Creek Resort 
This is another luxury resort in British Virgin Islands which is not very popular. It opened up to a very limited response and is still being worked upon so that crowds could be attracted in large numbers.
